name: Elegy - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Elegy, designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 2017, is a sophisticated console that confirms the company's vocation for luxury craftsmanship. It is characterized by a desire to experiment, which translates into mastery of processing techniques and attention to detail. To be fixed to the wall, it is made of solid American walnut, with a semi-elliptical top that can be crafted from wood or marble. Available in multiple finishes, this console becomes an original piece of furniture capable of creating tailor-made spaces.
